title: Free Umrah #assimalhakeem #assim assim al hakeem
transcript: ald Everyone likes freebies I'm one of those and alhamdulillah Nova Enterprise is giving a as a freebie to one person at the end of our tour inshallah in these four cities of Toronto admon Calgary and Ottawa so simply like subscribe and tag three of your friends and who knows maybe you'll be the lucky winner and the good thing is you don't have to pay a thing because then it would be gambling and it would be Haram and Allah will curse you for that so with the grace of Allah just go for the omra for free and hopefully Allah will forgive my sins and yours as well be
